page.title: 04GOING TO SCHOOL IN E.LANGDON
page.content: A village school day by Andrea aged 9. I normally get up at 7.30am and eat my Weetabix breakfast cereal. Mummy takes me from Martin Mill to school by car and in the village I buy a dougnut and sweets before walking to school. At school we have assembly including a song and a story. The juniors first do writing practice followed by project work on sugar. Later I go out to play chase with my friends and at 10.45am I come back in to work on my project after seeing a film like "Sugar from Queensland". At noon I have my lunch of Marmite roll,savoury biscuits and an orange. Other children have hot school meals for 50p. In the afternoon we have craft and nature. After school finishes at 3.00pm I go swimming with my parents. Mummy gets tea ready at 6.30 pm. When Daddy goes to the ferries at 8.15pm I go to bed.
